message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. What do you say?
You took 90% last round, now it's my turn to be fair, but I'll give you a slightly better deal this time
I appreciate your offer, but I'm still aiming for a slightly higher share. Let's split it 60/40 this time, with me taking the larger share. What do you think?
I'm starting to think you're not serious about being fair. I'll give you a smaller share this time, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of
Look, I'm willing to compromise, but I won't accept anything less than 45%. Let's split it 45/55 this time.  It's a fair deal considering the inflation.
